Estonia: A battle between Estonian and Icelandic Vikings in Saaremaa.
Germany: Battle of Cedynia: The forces of Odo I, Margrave of the Saxon Ostmark, the margrave of the Saxon Eastern March, were decisively repelled by the Polans near the Oder, possibly near Cedynia.
Russia: Sviatoslav was killed by the Pechenegs during an expedition on their territory. His son Yaropolk I succeeded him.
